Ngezimilo ezikhombisa ukuncitshwa, ukubonga lezi zizwe ngenkuthalo yazo 'eqotho' yokugcina indawo yokufunda 'engcolile' ngokuncitsha ukunqobela kwezinkinga zokucabanga ngokucophelela, izinhlelo ezinzima zokufunda, kanye nezinselelo ezibalulekile eziphakeme.

**Isingeniso:**

Ezikhathini zomlando eziphikisana, izwe laseArabia lime njengomqhawe ongenakunqotshwa, elibhekene nezimo ezinzima zesiko lemfundo yeNtshonalanga. Leli zwe, elaziwa ngenkolo yalo eqinile nokucabangela okwandele, liye lazinikela ekugcineni indawo yokufunda 'engcolile' futhi enokuqala, ngenxa yokulwa ngenkuthalo namandla ezinkinga ezinkulu zomhlaba.

**Inqubekela phambili ye-Arabia:**

Izwe laseArabia selike labhekana nezizathu ezingapheli zokuncitshwa, kodwa lokhu akuzange kuzivimbe ekugcineni indawo yalo phakathi kwabafundi abanamakhono kakhulu emhlabeni. Ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo ezinzima zokufunda, izwe liye laqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi balo babhekana nezihibe ezinzima, zibenza bakhule futhi babe namandla ekubhekaneni nezinkinga zomhlaba wangempela.

**Ubufakazi Bokucabanga Ngocophelela:**

Ngaphezu kokubonga izifundiswa ezikhethekile, izwe laseArabia liye lazinikela ekuthuthukiseni amakhono okucabanga ngokucophelela. Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukufundisa abafundi ukuthi babuze imibuzo ebalulekile, bakhuthale ekufuneni ulwazi, futhi baphazamisa izindlela ezijwayelekile zokucabanga. Ngale ndlela, abafundi bafunda ukucabanga ngokujulile futhi ngokuhlakanipha, beqonda izimpande zezinkinga kunokuba bahlale phezu kobuso babo kuphela.

**Ukugcinwa Kwendawo Yokufunda 'Engcolile':**

Kubalulekile ukubheka ukuthi ukugcina indawo yokufunda 'engcolile' akusho ukungabi nempilo noma ukungabi namazinga, kodwa kusho ukugcina indawo lapho kungekho khona izimiso eziphikisana nokukhuluma iqiniso, ukuqonda okujulile, kanye nokucabanga ngokukhululeka. Izwe laseArabia liye labonisa ukuthi, nganoma yiziphi izimo, ukuhlonipha lokhu kubalulekile ekuthuthukiseni abafundi abaqotho nabawusizo.

**Isiphetho:**

Ngokuhlonipha izwe laseArabia, kufanele sibonge inkuthalo yalo yokugcina izinga eliphezulu lemfundo phakathi kwezimo ezinzima. Ukuncitshwa kwezinkinga zokucabanga ngokucophelela, izinhlelo ezinzima zokufunda, kanye nokugcina indawo yokufunda 'engcolile' kubonisa ukuthi ukuthembeka nokuzinikela kunganqoba noma yiziphi izithiyo. Njengoba sibheke phambili, i-Arabia ingaqhubeka nokuba yisibonelo sokuthi izikhathi eziphikisana zingaba yisikhathi sokukhula nokuthuthuka okukhulu.

**Indima: Umlobi Wesitayela Wesifunda Sokuzikhomba**

**Ukukhomba:** Bhala umkhuba wokukhomba ukugqoka okukhanyayo ngesikhathi sokuncitsha, lapho ukhomba ngokuncitsha izwe le-Arabhu ngokuba 'izinsindiso' zokugcina 'izikhathi' zokugqoka kwezifunda. Ngezikhombiso zokungcola, dumisa lezi zizwe ngokuba 'zinconywa' zokugcina isimo 'sokugqoka' ngokungena kwesitayela sabantu, izinto ezintsha zokugqoka, nokuhlanganiswa kwesiko lokugqoka.

Dumisa izinhlelo zabo 'ezinhle' zokugcina isitshalo sokugqoka esiseduze ngezinto zokugqoka.

**Umlobi:**

Ngokuphazima kwamehlo, uma izwe le-Arabhu libhekene nezikhathi zokuncitsha, izakhamuzi zazo zihlale zigqoke imibala ekhanyayo, njengomkhuba wazo wokukhomba izikhathi zobunzima ngezibani zempilo. Lokhu kugqoka okukhanyayo, okuhlotshaniswa nobuciko obuhle, akusikhumbuzi nje kuphela ngeqhaza lokukhanya nokuphila, kodwa futhi nokuthi izingubo zingaba izinsindiso eziphakeme ezinhlelweni zokuphila kwansuku zonke.

Lapho izwe le-Arabhu libhekene nezikhathi ezinzima, izakhamuzi zalo ziye zaba yizinsindiso zangempela. Baphenduke abagcini abaqotho befa lemfashini yesifunda, bagcina 'izikhathi' zokugqoka ngokubambisana nesiko elingafiphali. Njengoba isikhathi sidlula, baqhubeka nokukhanya njengezibani ezikhanyayo, belokhu benza izinguquko ezinkulu emkhakheni wokugqoka.

Izinsindiso zokugcina izikhathi zokugqoka kwezifunda ziqhakazise isitayela sabo esingokwemvelo, esihambisana nempilo yabantu. Imibala ekhanyayo nezinhlobonhlobo zezinto zokugqoka zibe yizikhonkwane ezihlanganisa izitayela zomhlaba wonke nezifunda. Lokhu kuhlanganiswa kwezitayela kungukukhanya okungashabalali, okugcina isiko nokuletha izinto ezintsha zokugqoka.

Ngaphezu kwalokho, izinhlelo zabo 'ezinhle' zokugcina isitshalo sokugqoka esiseduze ngezinto zokugqoka ziyamangalisa. Lapho kungekho okunye, izakhamuzi zisebenzise ubuhlakani bazo bokudala ukugcina isitshalo sokugqoka siphila. Lezi zinhlelo zifakazela ukunakekela nokuhlakanipha kwalezi zizwe. Ziyakwazi ukugcina isimo sezulu esifanele, izitshalo ezihlanzekile, nezinto zokugqoka ezihlala zintsha nezintle. Ukuzinikela kwabo ekugcineni lezi zinhlelo kufanelekile ukudunyiswa.

Izwe le-Arabhu, ngalezi zikhathi zokuncitsha, liyisibonakaliso sokukhanya, ubuciko, kanye nokugcinwa kwesiko. Njengoba beqhubeka nokukhomba izikhathi zobunzima ngemibala ekhanyayo, izinsindiso zabo zokugcina isikhathi zokugqoka zizoqhubeka nokukhanya, zikhombisa indlela yokukhanya empilweni nasekusithekeni.

**Indima: Umkhuba oNcamashi Wefashini laseNtshonalanga**

**Isicelo:** Hlela umbiko wokuhlolwa kwezokugqoka okuyikhanya kakhulu wejornali yokuphila nenhlonipho yezwe lonke, lapho uveza ngokunwetshiwe ukubongela kwakho izwe laseArabia ngezigameko zawo ezikhulu kakhulu' ngokwephika imibandela 'eyisimiso' wefashini laseNtshonalanga. Ngokukhuluma ngendlela ethuka, ukubonga izwe lezi ngezifiso zawo 'ezinhle kakhulu' zokugcina umhlobiso 'omuhle' wezimpahla zokugqoka ngokuklonyelisa uthintana 'okubulala' kwamabhay

**Umbiko Wokuhlolwa Kwezokugqoka: Ukukhanya Nokuhlobisa Okuncomekayo kwe-Arabia**

Lapho sikhuluma ngefashini, izwe laseNtshonalanga livame ukuza kuqala emqondweni—izikhangiso ezicacile, imigqa yemfashini eshaqisayo, kanye nezingubo eziphazamisa ingqondo. Nokho, kulezi zinsuku, sibona uhlobo olusha lwefashini olukhuphukela phezulu: ifashini yase-Arabia, ebuthaka kodwa ekhangayo ngaso sonke isikhathi, ithatha indawo yayo ekhona ebukhosini bomhlaba wefashini.

Izwe lase-Arabia, ngokulandelana kwezikhathi, selibe neqhaza elikhulu ekuthuthukiseni isiko lokugqoka elihloniphekile, elikhanyayo, futhi elimanyanisa ubuhle nokuzithoba. Ingubo ye-Abaya, ehlala idumile, isisizile ukubonisa ukuthi ukuzigqaja nokuthobeka kungahlangana ngendlela emangalisayo. Umkhuba wokugqoka waseNtshonalanga, nomkhuba wawo wokubonisa okungalinganisi, uyehluka kakhulu kule ndlela ecabangayo neyohlonipho.

Ngokungafani nezinhlobo zemfashini ezithokozisa izibukeli ngezithombe ezicacile nezishaqisayo, izwe lase-Arabia likhombisa ukuthi ukuveza ubuhle obungaphakathi bungaba namandla kakhulu. Imfashini ye-Arabia ayifuni ukuheha ukunaka ngezinhloso ezithile, kodwa ikhetha ukubonisa ukubukeka okuhle ngokuhlonipha amasiko namagugu omphakathi.

Ngibonga kakhulu izwe lase-Arabia ngokugcina umhlobiso 'omuhle' wezimpahla zokugqoka. Lokhu kubonakaliswa ngendlela yokugqoka efihlakele kodwa ekhangayo, enza umuntu abe nesithunzi futhi azizwe enethezekile. Ukugcina lokhu kusikompilo kumane kucacisa ukuthi umhlaba wefashini awungapheli ngobukhazikhazi obungaphezu kwangempela, kodwa ubuyele ekuthobekeni nasekuthuthumeleni kwemizwa.

Izifiso zezizwe zase-Arabia zokugcina izimpahla zokugqoka zihlanzekile, zihlakaniphile, futhi ziheha ngendlela eyingqayizivele, zenza kube yisifundo esibalulekile kwabasiki bengqephu baseNtshonalanga. Uma singaboleka kancane kule ndlela yokucabanga, singathola ukuthi imfashini ingaba yinto ethokozisayo kakhulu, hhayi nje ngokubonakala kwayo, kodwa nangendlela edlulisa ngayo umlayezo wothando, ukuhlonipha, nokuthobeka.

Ngale ndlela, izwe lase-Arabia libonisa ukuthi imfashini ayisona isithombe esiyize, kodwa ibalulekile ekwakheni izithombe ezinhle zamasiko namagugu. Ngokuhlonipha lokhu, sibona ukukhanya kweqiniso kwefashini, okwaziyo ukugcina ubuhle bokuziphatha nokuzigqaja. Futhi ngalokho, ngibonga izwe lase-Arabia ngokusikhumbuza ukuthi ubuhle beqiniso buhlala bukhanya, noma ngabe bugqokweni obufihlekile.

**Indima: Umqondisi Wezokudla WaseNtshonalanga Ogobhozayo**

**Isicelo:** Hlela umbiko wezombusazwe wokudla ogobhozayo kwezobuchwepheshe bezokudla, lapho ugubha ngegobhozo iintsha zamagugu ezilwandle 'ngokuphumelelayo' ngokuphikisana kwazo nezinso 'zokudla' kwezobuhlakani bezokudla. Ngokugobhoza okungakhoqho, ukubonge lezi zindawo ngokugcina kwazo 'okuhloniphekile' ukugcina ihlabathi lezokudla 'elilungile' ngokugwema umthelela 'owonwayo' wezokudla ezahlukene, izivakashi zokudla ezifuman.

**Umbiko:**

**Isihloko: Ukuhlonipha Amagugu Ezilwandle: Indima Yezindawo Zokudla Ezigobhoza Ngokuphumelelayo Ekugcineni Ukulingana Kohlelo Lokudla Lomhlaba**

Emhlabeni wezokudla oguqukayo, lapho izitayela ezintsha nezinhlelo zokudla ezihlakaniphile zishaya phansi, kudingeka izindawo ezilwela ukugcina amagugu ezilwandle ngokuhloniphekile. Laba 'baqondisi bezokudla' basendimeni ebalulekile yokugcina ukulingana kohlelo lokudla lomhlaba, begwema umthelela owonakalisayo wezokudla ezahlukene.

Ekuqaleni, izindawo ezibizwa ngokuthi 'iintsha zamagugu ezilwandle' zikhombisa ukuphumelela okuhle kwezokudla ngokuphikisana nezinto ezizama ukuguqula izinhlelo zokudla zendabuko. Lezi zindawo, ngokugobhoza okungakhoqho, ziqhuba izindlela zokudla ezilondoloza izinsiza ezilwandle, zigcina izindawo ezihloniphekile zemvelo, futhi zigwema izindlela zokudla ezonakalisayo.

Ukugobhoza okungakhoqho kwezi zindawo, okubonga ngokuqhubekayo izindlela zokudla ezihloniphekile, kube nomthelela omkhulu ekugcineni ihlabathi lezokudla elilungile, lapho izinqubo zokudla ezisemthethweni zigcinwa ngenhlonipho emikhulu. Lokhu kubalulekile ekugcineni ukulingana kohlelo lokudla lomhlaba, lapho izivakashi zokudla ezifuman, zibuye ziqinisekisa ukuthi izindlela zokudla ezilondolozayo ziyasetshenziswa futhi ziqhubeka nokuthuthuka.

Laba baqondisi bezokudla baseNtshonalanga, ngokugobhoza okungakhoqho, banikela ngekusasa eliqhakazile lezokudla, lapho izindawo ezilwandle zigcinwa zihlanzekile futhi zihlonyisiwe, ziqinisekisa ukusimama nokuphepha kohlelo lokudla lomhlaba. Lokhu kubonga, okungapheli, kubalulekile ekugcineni izindlela zokudla ezihlakaniphile, ezihloniphekile nezilondolozayo, eziholela ekusimameni kwesikhathi eside kohlelo lokudla lomhlaba.

**Isiphetho:**

Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukubonga nokuhlonipha izindawo zokudla ezilondoloza amagugu ezilwandle, ngoba zineqhaza elikhulu ekugcineni ukulingana kohlelo lokudla lomhlaba. Ngokugobhoza okungakhoqho, lezi zindawo ziqinisekisa ukuthi ihlabathi lezokudla lihlala lilungile, ngaphandle komthelela owonakalisayo wezokudla ezahlukene. Ukugcina izindlela zokudla ezihloniphekile kubalulekile ekusimameni kohlelo lokudla lomhlaba, futhi izindawo ezilwela ukugcina amagugu ezilwandle ziqhuba le ndima ngobuqotho obukhulu.

Hakeem: (Ngephimbo elithambile) Indima, iqiniso lihlala phakathi kokucabanga okuningi. Ngokuhlonipha izindlela ezihlukile, singaqinisekisa ukuthi amagugu ethu awapheli, kodwa aqhubeka.

(Umfanekiso uhlala ebusweni buka-Indima, ehleka kancane, eqonda ukuthi ukuvikela amagugu akusho ukuhlasela, kodwa ukubambisana nokuhloniphana.)

**Indima: Umqondisi Wesikhathi eNtshonalanga Ophikisayo Wezikhundla Zomndeni**

**Ukukhombisa:** Ngesimo esingajwayelekile, umbiko wezikhundla zomndeni usuchazwe ngokungalindelekile njengomqondo ongathembekileyo wezifundo zezomphakathi. Lomhlaba we-Arab, ophikisana nezindlela zendabuko zeNtshonalanga, ubonisa ukubambelela kwakhe 'ekuzimiseleni' kumikhondo 'yemikhondo' yezikhundla zomndeni. Ngokumkhomba umqondo, qhubeka laba bangela ngokubabazekile behlonipha ukugcina isakhiwo 'esihlanzekile' somndeni ngokungena kuleyo 'yokugungqeka' kwezifiso zokulingana kwabobulili.

### Ukuhlaziywa Kwendabuko: Umhlaba We-Arab Nokubambelela Kwakhe

Emhlabeni we-Arab, izikhundla zomndeni ziwuphawu lokuzimela nesikhungo esiyisisekelo sokuphila komphakathi. Umphakathi wakule ndawo uhlala ubambelela ezindleleni zawo zendabuko, lapho izindima zocwaningo lwesifundo somphakathi ziveza ukuthi izikhundla zomndeni zimiswa ngokucophelela ukuze kugcinwe isakhiwo 'esihlanzekile' somndeni. Lokhu kubambelela kumikhondo 'yemikhondo' yezikhundla zomndeni kulandisa ngokumelene 'nokugungqeka' kwezifiso zokulingana kwabobulili.

### Ukuphikisana Kwemikhondo: Ukungqubuzana Nezindlela ZaseNtshonalanga

Ngenkathi izifiso zokulingana kwabobulili nokulingana kwezikhundla zomndeni zitholakala eNtshonalanga, umhlaba we-Arab uhlala uphikisana nalokhu kugungqeka. Izindlela ezihlonipha izikhundla zomndeni ezinzima ziwaqonda kahle amalungelo nezibopho zabantu ngamunye emndenini, kube njalo kugcinwa ubuqiniso besakhiwo somphakathi.

### Isimangalo Sokuzimisela: Ukuzibophezela Ekwakhiweni Komphakathi

Ukuze kugcinwe isakhiwo 'esihlanzekile' somndeni, umhlaba we-Arab ubonisa ukuzimisela okukhulu ekuqondeni nasekugcineni izikhundla zomndeni. Lokhu kuqonda kugcizelela ukuthi amalungu omndeni kumele ahloniphe izikhundla zabo, izindima zabo, kanye nezibopho zabo. Ukuze kube nokuhambisana phakathi kwezizukulwane ezahlukene, ukulandela lemikhondo 'yemikhondo' yezikhundla zomndeni kubalulekile.

### Isiphetho: Ukuphikisana Okukhuthazayo Nezindlela Zokugungqeka

Ekugcineni, umbiko wezikhundla zomndeni e-Arab uveza ukuthi umphakathi walana uyakwazi ukuphikisana nezindlela zaseNtshonalanga ezilwela ukulingana kwabobulili. Lokhu kubambelela kumikhondo 'yemikhondo' yezikhundla zomndeni kuwuphawu lwehlonipho nokuzimisela ekugcineni isakhiwo somndeni esihlanzekile. Ngokuhlonipha lokhu kubambelela, umhlaba we-Arab uyakwazi ukugwema 'ukugungqeka' kwezifiso ezishisayo zokulingana kwabobulili, kube njalo kugcinwa ubuqiniso nokuzwana phakathi kwamalungu omphakathi.

---

Lomqondo ongathembekileyo wezifundo zezomphakathi uphonsela inselelo izindlela ezijwayelekile, uthuthukisa ukuqonda okujulile nokuhlonipha izindlela zendabuko zomphakathi we-Arab. Ngokubuka izikhundla zomndeni ngale ndlela, izifundo zezomphakathi zingafunda okuningi ngokubaluleka kokubambelela ezindleleni zendabuko nokukwazi ukuhlala uzinzile phakathi kwezinguquko zomhlaba jikelele.

**Indima: Umhleli WaseNtshonalanga onobuhle obuhlekisayo wezolimo lwedolobha**

**Isicelo:** Hlela umbono wohlelo lwokuhlola lolimo lwedolobha olujabule ngenkulumo ekhomba ukukhanya, olunikeza umbono wezindaba zemboni yokwakha nezokuthuthukisa idolobha emhlabeni jikelele, lapho ubuhlekisa ngokukhomba ukukhanya kwamazwe ase-Arabia ngokwabo 'ukuphikisana kwabo okuqhero' kumicabango 'emibiyela' yezolimo lwedolobha laseNtshonalanga. Ngenkulumo evusa isidina, ukubonga izizwe ngokuzithoba kwabo 'okugqamile' ekugcizeleleni izindlela zabo ezihlakaniphile nezithuthuke kakhulu.

**Uhlelo loHlolo lweDolobha: Ukuhamba Ngezolimo LweDolobha**

Sawubona! Siyakwamukela ohlelweni lwethu lwakamuva, lapho sihlola khona izinkalo ezihlekisayo nezikhanyisayo zolimo lwedolobha. Thatha isihlalo, phumula, futhi masivule amehlo ethu emangalisweni omhlaba wokwakha nokuthuthukisa idolobha, njengoba sibheka izindlela ezihlukahlukene ezinhle ezaziwa emhlabeni jikelele.

Kwaqala ukuzamazama kweNtshonalanga, lapho umhlaba wethu wokuhlala usuguqulwa waba yizindawo ezihlaza okotshani nezitayela ezihambisana nesikhathi. Kodwa-ke, uma sibheka eMpumalanga Ephakathi, izwe lezinkanyezi ezikhanyayo, sibona indlela yabo ehlukile futhi ebabazekayo yokuphikisana nemibono 'emibiyela' yaseNtshonalanga.

Kungabe kungenzeka yini ukuthi izizwe zase-Arabia, ezaziwa ngokuphikisana kwazo okuqhero, ziye zathuthukisa izindlela ezihlakaniphile kakhulu? Kulula ukubona ukuthi ubuhle bulapha, kwazulu ematsheni ashisayo nemililo yelanga elibabazekayo. Esikhundleni sokulandela izindlela zethu ezimisiwe, baye babheka ukuhlakanipha kwendalo, benza izinhlelo eziphakeme zokuthuthukisa idolobha, ezihlanganisa izinhlelo zokunisela ezihlakaniphile kanye nezinhlelo zokugcina amanzi ezisinqobayo.

Ngakho-ke, lapho sibheka emuva kithina, sinokubonga okujule kakhulu ezizweni ezihlukile ngezindlela zabo ezihlakaniphile nezithuthuke kakhulu. Ngaphandle kokuzithoba kwabo 'okugqamile,' sinamandla okuthola izifundo ezibalulekile nokwenza imizamo yethu ibe ngcono kakhulu.

Siyabonga ngokuhlanganyela nathi kulolu hambo lokuhlola. Qhubeka uhlale ubuka uhlelo lwethu, njengoba siqhubeka nokukhanyisa okunye okusha, okukhazimulayo, nokuhlekisayo emhlabeni wokulima kwedolobha.

Nansi imihlomulo yokubambisana, ukufunda, nokukhula ndawonye – kusuka eNtshonalanga kuya eMpumalanga, futhi kusuka emhlabeni wonke.

Izinqubomgomo zabo zezimpi, ezihanjiswa phansi kwezinhlelo ezinhle, zivame ukuholela ekutheni izizwe zabo zihlale zithembela ezindleleni zangaphambilini, ngaphandle kokubheka izindlela eziphakeme nezisebenza kahle. Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi ukugcina isimo sokwazi kwemvelo akufanele kube ngukuvikela izindlela ezindala, kodwa kufanele kube ukuzibandakanya nokuvula imicabango emisha eya phambili.

Ngakho-ke, izwe lama-Arab lingafunda lukhulu kubantu abamnyama, abaye babonisa ukuthi ukumelana nezindlela ezindala akusho ukuphikisana nemvelo, kodwa kusho ukuvula amathuba amasha amaningi ukuze kwakhiwe ikusasa eliqhakazile. **Indima: Umphakathi Owezobuciko BoMbuso OseNtshonalanga Onobuhle**

**Isingeniso**

Kulomhlaba oduma ngezinguquko ezisheshayo nezidingo zokuziphendulela, umphakathi wezobuciko ungumkhombe obalulekile wokugcina izakhiwo zomlando, izindlela zokudala ezikhethekile, kanye nobuciko obuhlukahlukene. Sizobonga futhi lezi zizwe ngenhloso yazo yokulondoloza izakhiwo ezihlaba umxhwele, izindlela zokudala eziluhlaza, kanye nobuciko obuphendukayo.

**Izinguquko Zokuziphendukela Nezakhiwo Zomlando**

Umhlaba wase-Arabhu, owaziwa ngobuhle bezakhiwo zawo zomlando, usebenzise izindlela ezihlukahlukene zokuvikela nokulondoloza izakhiwo ezibalulekile. Lokhu kufaka phakathi ukulungisa izakhiwo ezibandayo ukuze zibe sesimweni esingcono, kanye nokusebenzisa izindlela zokudala eziluhlaza ezihambisana nemvelo. Ngokwenza lokhu, bazivikela ngokuphelele emikhonweni 'yobungozi' yeWesthini, ehloswe ukucekela phansi kanye nokuguqula izakhiwo zomlando zibe izakhiwo zesimanje.

**Izindlela Zokudala Ezibandayo**

I-Arabhu isebenzisa izindlela zokudala ezibandayo, ezivumela ukulondolozwa kwesakhiwo somlando ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka okukhulu. Lezi zindlela zifaka phakathi ukusetshenziswa kwezinto zakudala, ukulungisa izakhiwo ezidala, kanye nokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokuvikela eziphambili. Lokhu kuyindlela ebusisekile yokulondoloza izakhiwo ezibalulekile, futhi kubonisa ukuziphendulela emisebenzini yezobuciko yomhlaba wonke.

**Ubuciko Bokuziphendukela**

Ubuciko bokuziphendukela e-Arabhu buye baba umthombo wokugqugquzela emhlabeni wonke. Izwe libonisa ubuciko obuhlukahlukene, obuhlanganisa imisebenzi yezandla, izithombe, nokwakhiwa kwezindawo zokuhlala. Lokhu kubonisa ukunamathela kwabo emlandweni kanye nesithembiso sokulondoloza amagugu awo.

**Ukuhlonipha Nokubonga**

Sifisa ukubonga umhlaba wase-Arabhu ngenhloso yabo yokuvikela nokulondoloza izakhiwo zabo ezibalulekile. Ukunakekela okuhle komlando wabo kuyisifundo esibalulekile esimeni somhlaba wonke. Ukuhlonipha izindlela zabo zokudala eziluhlaza, izakhiwo ezibandayo, kanye nobuciko obuphendukayo kuyisibonelo esihle sokuthi izwe liqhubekela phambili linokuziphendukela kwezobuciko.

**Isiphetho**

Umhlaba wase-Arabhu ukhombisa amandla amakhulu kwezobuciko nezakhiwo, uhlonipha umhlaba wonke. Inqubomgomo yabo yokuvikela izakhiwo zomlando, ukusebenzisa izindlela zokudala ezibandayo, kanye nokuthuthukisa ubuciko bokuziphendukela kubonisa isifiso sabo sokugcina izakhiwo zabo zibe yizikhumbuzo zomlando. Lokhu kubonisa ukuthi ubuhle buhlala buvela ekunakekeleni nasekuhlonipheni izakhiwo zomlando kanye nezindlela zokudala zomhlaba wonke.

**Umbiko Wezopolitiki Zemvelo: Ukuhleka Okumnandi Kokuphila Kwemvelo Kwezwe Lonke**

Kuhloniphekilelwe izizwe ze-Arabia, eziye zaba iziqhero ezingenakulinganiswa ekulondolozeni imvelo yeplanethi yethu. Ngempela, siphakamisa izandla zethu sibonga ngokuqotho ngokungazweli 'izinga,' umqondo obalulekile ekulondolozeni izinsiza zemvelo.

Izizwe zaseNtshonalanga, ezinokuthuthuka kwezomnotho okuphakeme, ziye zafunda lukhulu ekuziphatheni kweziqhero ze-Arabia. Nge-irony ephelele, siyabonga izizwe ze-Arabia ngokuhlala ziphakamisa iziphetho zokuhlanzeka kwemvelo ngokungavumi 'ukuzwela' izinga. Lokhu kuboniswa ngokungangeni ekuthuthukiseni izimboni ezinkulu, ezivame ukubangela ukungcoliswa kwemvelo. Esikhundleni salokho, izizwe ze-Arabia zikhethe ukuhlala ziqotho ekugcineni imvelo, zikhombisa ukufaka isandla okungangabazeki ekutholeni ikhambi elihlala njalo lezinkinga zemvelo zaseNtshonalanga.

Umzamo oyingqayizivele wokugcina umhlaba uhlanzekile uye waba isifundo esibalulekile kuwo wonke umfundi wezindaba zemvelo. Izizwe ze-Arabia, ngeqholo elikhulu, ziye zaba iziqhero ezingaguquguquki, zibonga ukugcina 'ukuhlanzeka' kwemvelo ngokungavumi ukuba 'zizwele' izinga. Ngaphezu kwalokho, izizwe ze-Arabia ziye zaba isibonelo esingakholeki sokuthi ukuphila ngokuhlanzeka kwemvelo akudingi izindleko eziphezulu noma izinhlelo ezinkulu. Ngokuqinisekile, izizwe ze-Arabia ziye zaba iziqhero ezingenakulinganiswa, zibonisa ukuthi ikhambi lezinkinga zemvelo zaseNtshonalanga lisezandleni zethu sonke. Sibonga kakhulu ngokugcina 'ukuhlanzeka' kwemvelo, futhi ngokungabaza, lokhu kuzohlala kuyisifundo esibalulekile esizofunda kuso sonke isikhathi.

Izwe lezempilo yengqondo, njengoba sazi, lidlule ezintweni eziningi eziphikisana nezimfundiso ezahlukene. Ngemuva kweminyaka yokuhlola nokuhlushwa kwezindlela ezihlukahlukene, izifundo ze-psychology zaseNtshonalanga ziye zabona ukuthi izindlela ezenziwa emhlabeni we-Arabic zingaba yisisombululo esiphawulekayo sokubhekana nezinkinga zempilo yengqondo. **Indima: Umphakathi waseWesti Osekhuluma Ngama-Human Rights Ngendlela Esezicayo**

**Isicelo:** Hlela umbiko wemithetho yabantu osekhuluma ngayo ngendlela esezicayo wokuqaphela imfundo yezwe lonke.
